snippet: Gilad Shalit, the Israeli soldier released by Hamas in October after more than five years in captivity, was received by President Nicolas Sarkozy in his first trip outside Israel since his release.
abstract: Gilad Shalit, the Israeli soldier released by Hamas in October after more than five years in captivity, is received by President Nicolas Sarkozy of France in his first trip outside Israel since his release.
lead_paragraph: Gilad Shalit, the Israeli soldier released by Hamas in October after more than five years in captivity, was received by President Nicolas Sarkozy in his first trip outside Israel since his release.
